external_games.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse - Infernal Relics

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Infernal Relics
summary: Ancient deities, extra-planar elder gods, and dark spirits threaten the very fabric of reality! Includes The Argent Adept, NightMist, Akash'Bhuta, Apostate, The Ennead, GloomWeaver, Realm of Discord, and Tomb of Anubis.
